document.full_text: the most eye-catching theme in the first round of the n.h.l. playoffs has been the comebacks staged on three consecutive nights by the sharks, the capitals and the bruins.
document.title: teams that score first in playoff games are tough to beat
lines_and_colors: the most eye-catching theme in the first round of the n.h.l. playoffs has been the comebacks staged on three consecutive nights by the sharks, the capitals and the bruins.
